text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to give you an update on the Amazon
elastic search service Amazon elastic
search service makes it easy to run
elastic search a popular open source
engine for log analytics full text
search and application monitoring today
we're announcing support for elastic
search 5 in the service elastic search 5
comes with powerful new features that
make it faster more secure and easier to
use one of the most important new
features is support for painless
scripting painless is a new secure
scripting language from elastic search
it allows you to automate things like
filtering scoring and sorting query
results and updating the index in a
secure way another big Improvement is
that elastic search 5 is powered by
Lucine 63 which offers significantly
better indexing throughput so that newly
added data is available more quickly for
analysis additionally to make it easy
for you to take full advantage of
elastic search 5 the service now
supports 15 new elastic search apis
including shrink and reindex which allow
you to manage your index more easily and
efficiently it also supports six new
plugins including language analyzers for
Chinese and polish and data ingestion
tools lastly all Amazon elastic search
service domains using elastic search 5
come bundled with cabana 5 so if you're
starting a new elastic search Project
version 5 offers a lot of advantages
we'll continue to support versions 1.5
and 2.3 so you can migrate your
production clusters to version 5 if and
when you decide to do so when you
migrate to version 5 we recommend that
you first set up a new domain restore
your data from a snapshot test it and
then cut over to the new domain that's
it thanks a lot
[Music]
